abstract: Food and Drug Admin announces proposal for guidelines that will help pharmaceutical manufacturers develop generic versions of opioids that will deter their abuse by making them difficult to crush or dissolve.
lead_paragraph: The federal agency proposed guidelines to help drugmakers develop generic opioids that are hard to crush or dissolve.

headline.main: F.D.A. Encourages Hard-to-Abuse Generic Pain Pills
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; F.D.A. Encourages Hard-to-Abuse Generic Opioids

snippet: The federal agency proposed guidelines to help drugmakers develop generic opioids that are hard to crush or dissolve.
